about_the_game:
Command the flow of battle in a time based deckbuilder, where cards come with a Cast Time instead of an energy cost. The combined Cast Time of your cards dictates how long it'll take to cast and unleash their effects. But don't worry, you have as much time as you want to plan your turn.

Perfectly timing attacks to hit enemies as they're casting Breaks the skill they were about to use, removing it from their turn. Break all of an enemy's upcoming skills to Interrupt them, skipping their turn entirely! Keep the momentum going by consistently Interrupting enemies, softening them up for a swift victory!

Explore a colourful world which is being turned into a board game by the nefarious Board Master. Bucking the trend of all 3 acts being the same every time, the areas in Cardterrupters can appear in any order, keeping repeat plays fresh!

Features:

  • A deckbuilder with speed. Consider your cards' casting time, as well as how close the enemies are to attacking, whilst deciding your next step.

  • A turn-based game where enemy turns can be shortened and cancelled entirely through clever aggressive play.

  • Each Cardterrupter has their own focus in battle, bringing unique cards and charms to build powerful deck synergies.

  • Navigate 3D levels instead of choosing nodes from a 2D flowchart, but watch out for traps.

  • Each area has unique foes to battle and can be encountered in any order during a run, perfect for repeat playthroughs.

  • A upbeat and energetic soundtrack to shuffle your hands whilst you shuffle your hands
